acts.act_summary: Arrival and Catastrophe - Maya's excitement turns to horror

chapters.summary: Maya materializes in SRI's parking lot; sneaks into the demo as a 'consultant'; witnesses the mouse in action
Her temporal anchor destabilizes, causing an electrical surge; fire erupts; she saves Engelbart but the lab and prototypes are destroyed
Maya tries to recreate the mouse from memory; Bill English grows suspicious of her technical knowledge; partial success but components don't exist yet
Maya stops trying to rebuild and begins documenting for a slower, more deliberate technological future; bittersweet acceptance
